lines.text: Your current task is to reoptimize the magic lines of the town with the energy threshold.
The map shows you all key points of the town and the cost of connecting any 2 points.
You can only connect 2 points if it doesn't lead to a loop.
You can also remove a connection.
You can connect and disconnect points by tapping on them.
The goal is to minimize the total cost of the magic lines.
Congratulations! You have successfully reoptimized the magic lines of the town.
What you've just done is called Kruskal's algorithm which finds the minimum spanning tree of a graph.
A minimum spanning tree is a subset of the edges of a connected, edge-weighted graph that connects all the points together, without any cycles and with the minimum cost.
You have minimized the total cost of the magic lines.
You can now move on to the next task.
